text: The Famous Jett Jackson is a Canadian and American Disney Channel TV series. It is a coming-of-age television show for children between the ages of 12-16. The show is about a guy named Jett Jackson (Lee Thompson Young). He plays a teenage secret agent on a fictional TV show called Silverstone. The show was on the Disney Channel from October 25, 1998 â€“ June 22, 2001. It was removed from the channel in June 2004. It once aired on ABC Family. The show was also seen again on Disney XD in 2009. The Jett Jackson: The Movie aired on Disney Channel in 2001. == Cast == === Main === * Lee Thompson Young as Jett Jackson/Silverstone * Ryan Sommers Baum as J.B. Halliburton * Kerry Duff as Kayla West * Gordon Greene as Woodrick Jackson * Montrose Hagins as Miz Coretta * Melanie Nicholls-King as Jules Jackson === Other === * Jeffrey Douglas as Cubby * Lindy Booth as Riley Grant/Hawk * Nigel Shawn Williams as Nigel Essex/Artemus == Awards and nominations == The show The Famous Jett Jackson and its young cast were nominated for Young Artist Awards, presented by the nonprofit Young Artist Foundation, in several categories in the course of the show's run: Awards Year Result Award Category Won 1999 Young Artist Award Best Performance in a TV Comedy Series, Leading Young Actor Lee Thompson Young 1999 Young Artist Award Best Performance in a TV Comedy Series, Supporting Young Actor Ryan Sommers Baum 1999 Young Artist Award Best Performance in a TV Comedy Series, Supporting Young Actress Kerry Duff 1999 Young Artist Award Best Family TV Comedy Series The Famous Jett Jackson 2000 Young Artist Award Best Performance in a TV Drama Series, Leading Young Actor Lee Thompson Young 2000 Young Artist Award Best Performance in a TV Drama Series, Supporting Young Actor Ryan Sommers Baum 2000 Young Artist Award Best Performance in a TV Drama Series, Supporting Young Actress Kerry Duff 2001 Young Artist Award Best Performance in a TV Movie Kerry Duff (Jett Jackson: The Movie) 2001 Parents' Choice Awards Silver Honor The Famous Jett Jackson == References == == Other websites == * * Category:1998 television series debuts Category:Television series by Disney Category:1998 Canadian television series debuts Category:2001 Canadian television series endings Category:2001 disestablishments in the United States Category:2001 television series endings Category:1998 establishments in the United States
title: The Famous Jett Jackson
